def_en: You refer to an activity or situation as fun if you think it is pleasant and enjoyable and it causes you to feel happy.
If you say that someone is fun, you mean that you enjoy being with them because they say and do interesting or amusing things.

def_cn: 令人愉快的;让人开心的;有趣的
def_en: If you describe something as a fun thing, you mean that you think it is enjoyable. If you describe someone as a fun person, you mean that you enjoy being with them.

def_cn: 荒唐可笑的人;引人嘲笑的人
def_en: Someone who is a figure of fun is considered ridiculous, so that people laugh at them or make jokes about them.
If you do something for fun or for the fun of it, you do it in order to enjoy yourself rather than because it is important or necessary.

def_cn: (尤指不负责任的)玩笑，嬉闹，恶作剧
def_en: You can refer to playful behaviour as fun and games, especially if you disapprove of it because you think it is irresponsible.
If you do something in fun, you do it as a joke or for amusement, without intending to cause any harm.
If you make fun of someone or something or poke fun at them, you laugh at them, tease them, or make jokes about them in a way that causes them to seem ridiculous.
